name: Reposty for Instagram
description: The best Repost App for Instagram. Simple, Useful, Enjoyable...  - Repost photos and videos on Instagram - Save photos and videos easily - See your repost history - Replace, edit or remove watermark - Colorful watermarks - Repost from carousel as well  *How to #Repost:*  1. Open Instagram 2. Go to a post, click three dots on the top-right corner 3. Select Copy Link or Share Link... 4. Then, repost  *Disclaimer* This app is not affiliated with Instagram. Any unauthorized action or repost of photo/video and/or violations of Intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user. Respect the rights of the Instagram users.  Icon made by Freepik and Those Icons from www.flaticon.com.  Help Reposty to translate your language. Visit bit.ly/renstatranslate
